subject: Re: [junit] To mock final classes
msgSnippet: ... Even with data? (Just testing your statement. I like public data in the appropriate context.) -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Christian Pekeler wrote:

> Just don't use final. In my opinion, final and private are the most
> counterproductive keywords in Java.

Even with data? (Just testing your statement. I like public data in the
appropriate context.)
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
